GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.26 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
Input: sparcspkr - fix refcount leak in bbc_beep_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 418b6a3e12f75638abc5673eb76cb32127d0ab13, it was introduced in version v2.6.26 by commit 9c1a5077fdca99356c891af37931e537dea874f5. For more details please see the references link.
